message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this unique product. Given its value and potential, I believe a price of $1,300,000 is more than fair.  What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,150,000. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Bob, I appreciate you meeting me halfway.  However, the true value of this product is much closer to my initial offer. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,225,000. This is my final offer.
